      • searchAction

        public java.util.List<Law> searchAction​(java.lang.String action,
                                        java.lang.String role)
        This method build a list of laws related to an action agent
        Parameters:
        action - string with agent action to filter in ontology inside description laws
        role - string with the agent type (provide empty string if this doesn't matter
        Returns:
        List list of laws found in ontology
